name: Back Blast (Georhynne Greeff, Jandre Smith 200128, Zama Dhlamini)
name_original: Back Blast (Georhynne Greeff, Jandre Smith 200128, Zama Dhlamini)
description:
In a town where it is known for a special coven, that deals in the art of fart sorcery. The towns people look down upon this coven and want something to be done. They enlist the help of a new mayor. who reinstates that he will deal with the coven. However the mayor has ulterior motives. He has taken the entire coven to harness the power of the fart sorcery and destroy Townlandia to further his pursuit for world dominance. It is up to you Khethi to help save your family and stop the mayor from stealing all your covens power. Beware the mayor is aware that he is missing a final piece and will send his goons out to get you.

  • Zama Dhalmini - Lead Programmer/Lead Game Designer 
  •  Jandre Smith - Lead Art Designer/Level Design
  • Georhynne Greeff - Artist/UI
